Detailed Description

Contains information related to a detection thread.

Information related to a single detection thread

Member Function Documentation

int CFacialData::Classify ( CSVMUtils *  Clasif,
char *  suggestedlabel,
int  Area2Use = 0,
int  Res2Use = 0,
bool  boId = true,
char *  suggestedlabel1stage = NULL,
bool  boIlluminationNormalized = false,
bool  boCompute = true 
) [inline]

Classifies detection thread given a classifier (TBD).

Parameters:
Clasif Classifier to be used
suggestedlabel Label assigned
Area2Use Indicates the area used for classification (face =0, with context=1, eyes=2 )
Res2Use Indicates the resolution used for classification (fullres =0, half res=1, 1/4 res=2 )
boId The computed label affects the identity
suggestedlabel1stage Label assigned by the first stage classifier
boIlluminationNormalized Sets indicates the the classification is performed using the illumination normalized image
boCompute Forces recomputing the label

void CFacialData::CopyNormalizedImages ( BYTE *  img,
BYTE *  imgmasked,
BYTE *  imgIN,
int  caraxctx,
int  carayctx,
int  carax,
int  caray,
int  offxctx,
int  offyctx 
) [inline]

Extract the normalized images.

Receives a caraxctx*carayctx BYTE image and saves two the normalized ipl images.

Parameters:
img Unmasked input image with caraxctx*carayctx dimensions
img Masked input image with caraxctx*carayctx dimensions
imgIN Illumination normalized input image with caraxctx*carayctx dimensions
caraxctx Width of the normalized image containing some context
carayctx Height of the normalized image containing some context
carax Width of the normalized image
caray Height of the normalized image
offxctx Relates the width of both images
offyctx Relates the height of both images

Copies Facial information.

Copies all facial information contained in given structure

Parameters:
FacialData Facial information to be copied
